DOC.brief_summary: This study is to test whether or not 32 milligrams (mg) of ruboxistaurin a day over three years will reduce vision loss associated with diabetic retinopathy.
DOC.brief_title: Protein Kinase C (PKC) Inhibitor-Diabetic Retinopathy Phase 3 Study
